es.ucm.fdi.ici.fsm

Class FSM

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.ici.fsm.FSMObservable
      • es.ucm.fdi.ici.fsm.FSM

  • public class FSM
extends FSMObservable
    Implements a generic Finite State Machine. Extends FSMObservable to allow event notification to registered observers.
    Author:
    Juan Ant. Recio Garc√≠a - Universidad Complutense de Madrid

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(State source,
                Transition transition,
                State target)
        Adds a new transition from a source state to a target state

      • ready

        public void ready(State initial)
        Indicates that the FSM has been built and is ready for execution
        Parameters:
        initial - is the initial state of the FSM

      • run

        public pacman.game.Constants.MOVE run(Input in)
        Executes a tick on the FSM. Evaluates any out transition of the current state according to the input. If a transition is applicable, it changes to the target state and executes it. If no transitions are available or applicable, executes current state.

      • getInitialState

        public State getInitialState()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the FSM to the initial state. Should be called from the precompute() method of the controller to reset the FSM for each evaluation cycle.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
